com.upsight.android.marketing

Class UpsightContentMediator<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.upsight.android.marketing.UpsightContentMediator<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NoViewContentMediator, VastContentMediator, WebViewContentMediator

    public abstract class UpsightContentMediator<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    The UpsightContentMediator interface implemented by components that supply Billboard with content.

        contentMediator - The content mediator.

      • getContentProvider

        public abstract java.lang.String getContentProvider()
        Gets the content provider name of marketing content handled by the UpsightContentMediator implementation.
        Returns:
        The content provider name.

      • buildContentModel

        public abstract T buildContentModel(MarketingContent<T> content,
                                    MarketingContentActions.MarketingContentActionContext actionContext,
                                    JsonObject model)
        Builds the content model.
        Parameters:
        content - The MarketingContent.
        actionContext - The com.upsight.android.analytics.internal.action.ActionContext.
        model - The JSON representation of the content model.
        Returns:
        view The content model; or null if failed.

      • buildContentView

                                                   MarketingContentActions.MarketingContentActionContext actionContext)
        Builds the content view.
        Parameters:
        content - The MarketingContent.
        actionContext - The com.upsight.android.analytics.internal.action.ActionContext.
        Returns:
        view The content view; or null if the content has no associated View.

      • hasContentReady

        public abstract boolean hasContentReady(MarketingContent<T> content)
        Checks if content is loaded and ready to display.
        Parameters:
        content - The MarketingContent.
        Returns:
        true if there is content ready to display; false otherwise.

      • startManagement

        public abstract void startManagement(UpsightBillboard.AttachParameters params,
                                     MarketingContent<T> content,
                                     android.content.Context context)
        Starts management of the billboard lifecycle when the content is the first content in a chain. The rest of the chain will share the same management.
        Parameters:
        params - The UpsightBillboard.AttachParameters.
        content - The MarketingContent.
        context - The Context.

      • displayContent

        public abstract void displayContent(MarketingContent<T> content,
                                    android.app.FragmentManager fragmentManager,
                                    BillboardFragment fragment)
        Displays the content.
        Parameters:
        content - The MarketingContent.
        fragmentManager - The FragmentManager.
        fragment - BillboardFragment to attach the content.

      • hideContent

        public abstract void hideContent(MarketingContent<T> content,
                                 android.app.FragmentManager fragmentManager,
                                 BillboardFragment fragment)
        Hides the content.
        Parameters:
        content - The MarketingContent.
        fragmentManager - The FragmentManager.
        fragment - BillboardFragment to detach the content from.

      • getPresentationStyle

        public UpsightBillboard.PresentationStyle getPresentationStyle(MarketingContent<T> content)
        Gets the UpsightBillboard.PresentationStyle that the marketing content prefers to be rendered in. The default implementation returns UpsightBillboard.PresentationStyle.None.
        Parameters:
        content - The marketing content.
        Returns:
        The UpsightBillboard.PresentationStyle.

      • getDimensions

        public java.util.Set<UpsightBillboard.Dimensions> getDimensions(MarketingContent<T> content)
        Gets the set of UpsightBillboard.Dimensions that the marketing content prefers to be rendered in. The default implementation returns an empty set.
        Parameters:
        content - The marketing content.
        Returns:
        The set of UpsightBillboard.Dimensionss.
